data.title: Cruel Marriage Of Queen Farida To the Last King Of Egypt
data.meta_description: Queen Farida’s transformation from a considerably privileged yet normal life to the life of Egyptian royalty marked a story full of conflicts. Born in an Egyptian noble family, she was in the leading…
data.text:
Queen Farida’s transformation from a considerably privileged yet normal life to the life of Egyptian royalty marked a story full of conflicts. Born in an Egyptian noble family, she was in the leading circle of society, but nothing could have prepared her for the royal marriage later on.

When King Farouk, Egypt’s monarch, first saw Farida, her future was unavoidably affected. Plucked from the life of relative normalcy and put in the spotlight as the Queen of the nation, her story quickly turned from fantasy to tragedy. The public perceived her as the lucky girl who had won the heart of a king, but life in the palace revealed darker secrets.

The story of Farida is not just a historical report, but it showcases personal sacrifices concealed in royal families. Her experiences prove that the intense pressures and emotional drain that come with a life of great privilege and public criticism are dark consequences.

A Doomed Union
